Module it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.gui
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.rounds

Interface RoundInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
ActionRound, IngressCardSwapActionRound, IngressHallSwapActionRound, PianificationRound, SetUpRound, StudentToHallActionRound, StudentToIslandActionRound
public interface RoundInterface
Interface used to define every method for which a round can answer (with a boolean) to express the possibility of making a specific action in the game
